main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Automatically scrapes indices of calls from the EU website, extracts detailed data and PDF links, and updates the database.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Manages a PostgreSQL database using SQLAlchemy ORM for storing call data with various attributes like funding details, deadlines, etc.

main_features.name: Adminer Access
main_features.description: Provides access to an Adminer instance through Docker, allowing users to manage the PostgreSQL database directly from a web interface.

main_features.name: API Endpoints
main_features.description: Exposes RESTful API endpoints using FastAPI for retrieving and managing call data, including CRUD operations.

main_features.name: Dashboard UI
main_features.description: Displays real-time system status, scraping statistics, and a paginated list of calls with detailed information and interactive features.

corrective_actions.solution: Ensure that the `Base = declarative_base()` import statement is included in the file where it's referenced.
